author: Bss . Dhaka
title: 15 persons, BAF win Independence Award
text:
15 persons, BAF win Independence Award BSS . Dhaka | Update: 22:40, Feb 16, 2017 0 Like 
The government on Thursday finalised names of 15 persons and one organisation for 'Independence Award -2017' for their glorious and outstanding contributions at the national level. 
Prime minister Sheikh Hasina will give away the award at a function at Osmany Memorial Auditorium in the city on 23 March, said a notification of the cabinet division. 
The recipients of the Independence Award-2017 are retired group captain Shamsul Alam Bir Uttam (independence and liberation war), Ashraful Alam (independence and liberation war), Shaheed Md Nazmul Huq (independence and liberation war), late Syed Mahsin Ali (independence and liberation war), Shaheed NM Nazmul Ahsan (independence and liberation war), Shaheed Faizur Rahman Ahmed (independence and liberation war), Bangladesh Air Force (independence and liberation war), professor AHM Touhidul Anowar Chawdhury (medical science), Begum Rabeya Khatun (literature), late Golam Samdani Koraishi (literature), professor Enamul Huq (culture), Ostad Bazlur Rahman Badal (culture), Khalil Kazi OBE (social service), Shamsuzzaman Khan (research and training), late professor Lalit Mohan Nath (research and training) and professor Mohammad Asaduzzaman (public administration).
